wyr1: Would you rather go into the past and meet your ancestors or go into the future and meet your great-great-grandchildren?
wyr2: Would you rather have more time or more money?
wyr3: Would you rather have a rewind button or a pause button on your life?
wyr4: Would you rather be able to talk with the animals or speak all foreign languages?
wyr5: Would you rather win the lottery or live twice as long?
wyr6: Would you feel worse if no one showed up to your wedding or to your funeral?
wyr7: Would you rather be without internet for a week, or without your phone?
wyr8: Would you rather meet George Washington or the current president?
wyr9: Would you rather lose your vision or your hearing?
wyr10: Would you rather work more hours per day, but fewer days or work fewer hours per day, but more days?
wyr11: Would you rather listen to music from the ’70s or music from today?
wyr12: Would you rather become someone else or just stay you?
wyr13: Would you rather be Batman or Spiderman?
wyr14: Would you rather be stuck on a broken ski lift or in a broken elevator?
wyr15: For your birthday, would you rather receive cash or gifts?
wyr16: Would you rather go to a movie or to dinner alone?
wyr17: Would you rather always say everything on your mind or never speak again?
wyr18: Would you rather make a phone call or send a text?
wyr19: Would you rather read an awesome book or watch a good movie?
wyr20: Would you rather be the most popular person at work or school or the smartest?
wyr21: Would you rather put a stop to war or end world hunger?
wyr22: Would you rather spend the night in a luxury hotel room or camping surrounded by beautiful scenery?
wyr23: Would you rather explore space or the ocean?
wyr24: Would you rather go deep-sea diving or bungee jumping?
wyr25: Would you rather be a kid your whole life or an adult your whole life?
wyr26: Would you rather go on a cruise with friends or with your spouse?
wyr27: Would you rather lose your keys or your cell phone?
wyr28: Would you rather eat a meal of cow tongue or octopus?
wyr29: Would you rather have x-ray vision or magnified hearing?
wyr30: Would you rather work in a group or work alone?
wyr31: Would you rather be stuck on an island alone or with someone who talks incessantly?
wyr32: Would you rather be too hot or too cold?
wyr33: When you’re old, would you rather die before or after your spouse?
wyr34: Would you rather have a cook or a maid?
wyr35: Would you rather be the youngest or the oldest sibling?
wyr36: Would you rather get rich through hard work or through winning the lottery?
wyr37: Would you rather have a 10-hour dinner with a headstrong politician from an opposing party, or attend a 10-hour concert for a music group you detest?
wyr38: Would you rather be an Olympic gold medalist or a Nobel Peace Prize winner?
wyr39: Would you rather have a desk job or an outdoor job?
wyr40: Would you rather live at the top of a tall NYC apartment building or at the top of a mountain?
wyr41: Would you rather have Rambo or The Terminator on your side?
wyr42: Would you rather be proposed to in private or in front of family and friends?
wyr43: Would you rather have to sew all your clothes or grow your own food?
wyr44: Would you rather hear the good news or the bad news first?
wyr45: Would you rather be your own boss or work for someone else?
wyr46: Would you rather have nosy neighbors or noisy neighbors?
wyr47: Would you rather be on a survival reality show or dating game show?
wyr48: Would you rather be too busy or be bored?
wyr49: Would you rather watch the big game at home or live at the stadium.
wyr50: Would you rather spend the day with your favorite athlete or your favorite movie star?
wyr51: Would you rather live where it is constantly winter or where it is constantly summer?
wyr52: Would you rather travel the US and see the sights in a motorhome or by plane?
wyr53: Would you rather be a little late or way too early?
wyr54: Would you rather have an unlimited gift certificate to a restaurant or a clothing store?
wyr55: Would you rather date someone you met online or go on a blind date?
wyr56: Would you rather your kids wear a uniform to school or clothing of their choice?
wyr57: Would you rather have many good friends or one very best friend?
wyr58: Would you rather live in Antarctica or the Sahara Dessert?
wyr59: Would you rather be able to take back anything you say or hear every conversation around you?
wyr61: Would you rather be poor and work at a job you love, or rich and work at a job you hate?
wyr62: Would you rather have your flight delayed by 8 hours or lose your luggage?
wyr63: Would you rather be in your pajamas or a suit all day?
wyr64: Would you rather have your first child when you are 18 or 40?
wyr65: Would you rather be the star player on a losing basketball team or ride the bench on a winning one?
wyr66: Would you rather spend the next year exempt from all taxes or have a one-month paid vacation?
wyr67: Would you rather have the best house in a bad neighborhood or the worst house in a good neighborhood?
wyr68: Would you rather be filthy rich and live 400 years ago or be poor but live today?
wyr69: Would you rather be gossiped about or never talked about at all?
wyr70: Would you rather end hunger or hatred?
wyr71: Would you rather be an unknown major league baseball player or a famous badminton star?
wyr72: Would you rather go without TV or junk food for the rest of your life?
wyr73: Would you rather spend the day at an amusement park or lazing on the beach?
wyr74: Would you rather be fluent in all languages or be a master of every musical instrument?
wyr75: Would you rather sing a song in front of complete strangers or your closest friends?
wyr76: Would you rather own your own boat or your own plane?
wyr77: Would you rather meet the president of the United States or a movie star?
wyr78: Would you rather spend two weeks stuck in a psychiatric hospital or stuck in an airport?
wyr79: If you had to give up one thing for the rest of your life, would it be brushing your hair or brushing your teeth?
wyr80: Would you rather spend 20 years in prison and be exonerated as innocent or be put away for four years (despite your innocence) and be considered guilty forever?
wyr81: Would you rather own a house or rent a residence?
wyr82: Would you rather be known as a one-hit wonder for a novel or a song?
wyr83: Would you rather take an action-packed European vacation or spend two weeks at the same Caribbean resort?
wyr84: Would you rather be a character in an action-packed thriller or a romantic comedy?
wyr85: Would you rather be stuck on a train or a bus?
wyr86: Would you rather be a part of an arranged marriage or spend your life as a single person?
wyr87: Would you rather babysit a crying infant for a day or have an unwanted houseguest for a week?

wyr89: Would you rather sing like an opera star or cook like a gourmet chef?
wyr90: Would you rather have your debt forgiven or have guaranteed good health for a decade?
wyr91: Would you rather live the rest of your life as a monk or followed continuously by paparazzi?
wyr92: Would you rather be given a lifetime supply of delicious food or books?
wyr93: Would you rather be able to breathe underwater or fly through the air?
wyr94: Would you rather be known for your intelligence or your good looks?
wyr95: Would you rather eat pizza or ice cream as the only food for eternity?
wyr96: Would you rather mentally or physically never age?
wyr97: Would you rather change your eye color or your hair color?
wyr98: Would you rather have the details of your financial life or your love life be made public?
wyr99: Would you rather spend the night in an aquarium or in a botanical garden?
wyr100: Would you rather have a family of 12 children or never be able to have children at all?
